name: Parker's Plummet
description:
Made in 48 Hours for the University of Utah's 'Fall'-themed Student Game Jam! 

Parker the Pumpkin has been kidnapped by the sinister, magical overlord of Hallow’s Nest. He finds himself bound in chains within the highest room in the highest tower of the highest castle. It is up to you to help Parker escape from his predicament, though it's all downhill from here...

[ SPECS ] 

-- 640x360, Windows

 [ CONTROLS ] 

--  Rotation: A/D or Left/Right

-- Jump: Spacebar

-- Shop: Mouse

Planned Post-Contest Patches:

  •  Round End Button
  • Collectibles
  • Gameplay Balancing
  • Art Fixes / New Animations
  • Bug Fixes
  • Further Levels (?)
